description.line1: Since 2018 we’ve been working hard to create powerful tools
description.line2: for a safer and more private internet that respects their users.

achieve.title: Effort
achieve.description: We truly believe that if something seems impossible it is only because it has not been tried enough, we make the impossible happen.

privacy.title: Learning
privacy.description: We all know a lot of a little and a little of a lot... by sharing what we know we all win and learn something new every day.

family.title: Team
family.description: Whether you work from home or come to the office, we want you to feel like part of the family. We love spending time together both on and off the office hours.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: Internxt is what it is today because of our team. We want them to grow personally so they get where they want in life and inside the company.
